item.description:
"Don't starve Gaza!"

Israeli activists try to deliver food aid to Gaza in a show of support for Palestinians. Police turned it back. The aim was to show "there are people in our society who feel what is happening in Gaza is unacceptable", organisers said https://t.co/AVVD9ArMpF pic.twitter.com/CUGConLfX3

Rupert Murdoch is engaged once again -- at 92.
